meanings.definition: Pilaffs (noun): a dish of rice cooked in seasoned broth with meat or vegetables.
meanings.sent1: For dinner, Mom made delicious pilaffs with chicken and vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served a flavorful pilaffs dish with lamb and spices.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone loved the pilaffs so much they asked for the recipe.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the pilaffs filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: The colorful pilaffs on the plate looked like a work of art.

meanings.definition: Pilaffs (verb): to cook rice in seasoned broth with meat or vegetables.
meanings.sent1: I will pilaffs the rice with beef broth and carrots for dinner.
meanings.sent2: She pilaffs the rice perfectly every time, creating a delicious meal.
meanings.sent3: He decided to pilaffs the rice with a secret blend of spices for extra flavor.
meanings.sent4: The chef pilaffs the rice with such skill that it always turns out amazing.
meanings.sent5: Watching her pilaffs the rice was like witnessing a culinary masterpiece.
